comments: Professor Schaefer is a great professor, I\'m actually amazed that people think his class is difficult/confusing. He gives you a lot of really relevant information and is very clear with course requirements (which are quite reasonable). If you have a chance to take a class with him- DO IT!

Took constitutional law with him he really didn\'t like me because my cellphone rang one day in class and I sat up front and from that day he really couldn\'t stand me. Everything is power point and you can actually go online and print out the power point everything is straight from his notes.
Professor schaffer is pretty hard. his tests, are written in the language the us constitution is written in. confusing as hell. hes a cool guy though.
